name: Dancing Ball Rolling Up In The Sky
name_original: Dancing Ball Rolling Up In The Sky
description:
This game is very challenging.
The cube floor is moving.
If you fall from the cube floor, you will die.
You can say that this is a running game.
You can also say that this is a jumping game.
Beautiful picture and dynamic music.
This game will bring you endless fun.
This game may be relatively simple at the beginning,
but increasingly difficulty and challenging.
